hbb1 /

wandb /

      openui---OpenUI let's you describe UI using your imagination, then see it rendered live.

langgenius /

      dify---Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.

Skyvern-AI /

      skyvern---Automate browser-based workflows with LLMs and Computer Vision

assafelovic /

      gpt-researcher---GPT based autonomous agent that does online comprehensive research on any given topic

IcarusRyy /

      NewJob---一眼看出该职位最后修改时间，绿色为2周之内，暗橙色为1.5个月之内，红色为1.5个月以上

Blealtan /

      efficient-kan---An efficient pure-PyTorch implementation of Kolmogorov-Arnold Network (KAN).

ChatGPTNextWeb /

      ChatGPT-Next-Web---A cross-platform ChatGPT/Gemini UI (Web / PWA / Linux / Win / MacOS). 一键拥有你自己的跨平台 ChatGPT/Gemini 应用。

DataTalksClub /

      mlops-zoomcamp---Free MLOps course from DataTalks.Club

airbnb /

      lottie-ios---An iOS library to natively render After Effects vector animations

rasbt /

      LLMs-from-scratch---Implementing a ChatGPT-like LLM from scratch, step by step

VinciGit00 /

      Scrapegraph-ai---Python scraper based on AI

FlowiseAI /

      Flowise---Drag & drop UI to build your customized LLM flow

rustdesk /

      rustdesk---An open-source remote desktop, and alternative to TeamViewer.

reorproject /

      reor---Private & local AI personal knowledge management app.

songquanpeng /

      one-api---OpenAI 接口管理 & 分发系统，支持 Azure、Anthropic Claude、Google PaLM 2 & Gemini、智谱 ChatGLM、百度文心一言、讯飞星火认知、阿里通义千问、360 智脑以及腾讯混元，可用于二次分发管理 key，仅单可执行文件，已打包好 Docker 镜像，一键部署，开箱即用. OpenAI key management & redistribution system, using a single API for all LLMs, and features an English UI.

OpenDevin /

      OpenDevin---🐚 OpenDevin: Code Less, Make More

cloudwu /

      skynet---A lightweight online game framework

harry0703 /

      MoneyPrinterTurbo---利用AI大模型，一键生成高清短视频 Generate short videos with one click using AI LLM.
